GYS_user_val Class Reference

#include <gys.h>

Inherits RefCntObject.

List of all members.

Detailed Description

User value abstract class.

Create derived class to store user values with specified typename. Use pointers to new class objects to pass user data into GYS_ret_val. GYS_ret_val will use redefined get_user_val() and get_type_name() member functions from the derived class. Also user has to define GYS_ret_val& store(GYS_ret_val& val, <data_type_name_in_cpp> user_data) function to store data in GYS_ret_val using this class... More info: special docs and examples.
